|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There is a single USB ID within one of Amped's drivers for this product (netrtwlanu_vt64.inf / AMD64 driver set?) - 7392:a813 - where it is tersely noted as a "Amped Wireless UA230A High Power AC Wi-Fi USB Adapter". Other drivers within the same driver set have considerably more. :It's assumed the 7392:a813 USB ID is correct. This is the same USB ID used by the [[Edimax EW-7811UAC]].
[[Category:English Documentation]]
